item.description:
This is the afternoon session of the Movie/TV Show Marathon. We split the meetups so you could go to one if you couldn't make both. Please RSVP to both if you are going to both.

We booked the screening room at the Somerville Theater on March 20th! We'll probably take a break in between the afternoon and the evening session to pick up dinner around Davis Square, we have the room from 2pm to 11pm.

Because renting the screening room at the theater is not free, there is a charge to this meetup. All proceeds will go toward the renting of the room and expenses related to the meetup.

I talked to theater and they said we can bring in whatever we want as long as it isn't hard liquor. Beer and hard cider are served on the premise as well :-)

The theme for this marathon will be a night of Trek.

List of episodes for the Afternoon Session:
at 2:15PM Space Seed
at 3:30PM Mirror, Mirror
at 4:45PM The Trouble with Tribbles
item.name: Somerville Theater Movie Marathon Afternoon Session
